verses.roman:
ei-mata vilāsa prabhura bhakta-gaṇa lañā
hena-kāle vallabha-bhaṭṭa milila āsiyā

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; vilāsa—pastimes; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhakta-gaṇa lañā—with His devotees; hena-kāle—at this time; vallabha-bhaṭṭa—the greatly learned scholar named Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; milila—met; āsiyā—coming.
translation: Thus Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu performed His pastimes with His devotees. Then a learned scholar named Vallabha Bhaṭṭa went to Jagannātha Purī to meet the Lord.

purport.content: For a description of Vallabha Bhaṭṭa, one may refer to the Madhya-līlā, Chapter Nineteen, text 61.
